Àtụ:Infobox settlement
Okigwe bụ obodo nke atọ kachasị ukwuu, mgbe Owerri na Orlu gasịrị, ebe Ohaji / Egbema bụ nke anọ na steeti Imo
Okigwe dị na ime Okigwe Local Government Area nke Nigeria
[citation needed] Obodo ahụ dị n'etiti ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè, Port Harcourt-Enugu-Maiduguri, ebe ọ bụ obodo kacha nso na nnukwu ahịa ehi na Naijiria, nke dị na Umu Nneochi Area nke Abia steeti
Ya mere, obodo ahụ aghọwo nnukwu obodo na-ebugharị ehi maka mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda nke Naịjirịa
Okigwe nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 132,237 (2005 census)
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi ebe ahụ bụ ndị ọrụ si steeti ndị ọzọ
Obodo Okigwe bụ isi ebe obibi nke Mahadum Imo State ochie (nke bụzi Mahadum Abia State)
Okigwe nwere ebe ndị njem nleta na akụkọ  mere eme dị iche iche
[citation needed] Federal Government College dị n'obodo ahụ anọgidewo na-abụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị mma na Naịjirịa
Okigwe ka bụ otu n'ime achịcha achịcha nke Naịjirịa na-akụ n'ala ugbo ya dị n'ugwu
Okigwe na-etu ọnụ n'ọtụtụ ebe ntụrụndụ dịka Alexandra Suites & Hotels Limited Okigwe Imo steeti nke dị na No 1 Alexandra Ave, Umuchima Road, Ubahu
Mary's Cathedral na Okigwe bụ oche nke Roman Catholic Diocese nke Okigwe
N'afọ 2016, gọọmentị steeti Imo weghachiri ahịa ehi ọhụrụ n'obodo ahụ n'ihe gbasara nke gara aga nke a kwagara na Abia.
Okigwe nwere obodo ise na-achị onwe ha bụ ndị nwere obodo dị iche iche (n'ime oghere) ya bụ;
Ala ahụ bụ ụrọ na-acha ọbara ọbara na oji, ma ọ bụ na-acha nchara nchara
Ihe ọkụkụ ndị a na-akụ na mpaghara ahụ n'ala ugbo ya dị n'ugwu bụ nkwụ (mmanụ nkwụ na mmanya nkwụ), cassava, na akwụkwọ nri.
